attributes.action: Change the 4 week summer holidays back to 6 weeks.
attributes.additional_details: Tell rishi sunak leave are holidays alone
attributes.background: Tell rishi sunak leave are summer holidays alone we all need a break we feel like 4 weeks is to short for us we want are 6 week holidays back

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

The Government has not announced any plans to reduce the length of school summer holidays in England, so we're not sure what you want the Government or Parliament to do.
